record.dc:title: 61BY11 Rymer, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 15BY97, a mature male. Square 1R17.
record.wpa:narrative: Mature male in fair condition, extended on back with head to NE. Most of bones present; torso deteriorated, skull crushed. Miscellaneous long bones and pelvis of two individuals buried along lower legs of 15BY97--possible that 15BY97 was intrusive to the two individuals (15BY100, 15BY101) which were reburied with 15BY97.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration available on file. Close up of burial 15BY97 from photograph 60BY11.
